alert.note: Alert for Irion; Tom Green (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 24 at 9:30PM CDT until June 24 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR EASTERN TOM GREEN AND EAST CENTRAL IRION COUNTIES... At 930 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near O.c. Fisher Reservoir, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... San Angelo around 940 PM CDT. Goodfellow Air Force Base around 945 PM CDT. Wall around 955 PM CDT. Veribest around 1005 PM CDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Harriet and Us-67 Near The Irion-Tom Green County Line. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
